ygData.msgSnippet: Someone s been watching to many episodes of X-Files.... hehe j/king
ygData.messageBody:
Someone's been watching to many episodes of X-Files.... hehe j/king

--- Rakim2001@... wrote:
> From: Rakim2001@...
>
> I am one of those people that truly believes in conspiracy theories and
> in my
> opinion the CFPole is a conspiracy. How do we all know that someone on
> this
> very list might have given us a so called "broken recipe" and it was
> actually
> the right one but they wanted to throw people off and have people not
> try it?
> Cause think about it if someone turns in a recipe that so called
> "doesn't
> work" then NO ONE will even try that recipe again because they know it
> "doesn't work" thus they are one of the few people who can actually make
> it.
> So those are just my thoughts. And as 4 the four slot thing I think
> that
> might be real. I think this recipe probably is 4 slots. But then again
> how
> do you all know that I haven't made one my self and just lying? Dont
> trust
> any one cept guildmates that's what I have learned over the years.
>
> Roj
